description: a(n) and a(n)+4^k are primes at least for k=1,2,3,4.
example: 7,7+4=11,7+16=23,7+64=71,7+256=263 are all primes: it is the smallest such quintet.
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = isprime(n) && isprime(n+4) && isprime(n+4^2) && isprime(n+4^3) && isprime(n+4^4); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 31 2013
author: _Labos Elemer_
